attributes.action: ensure that those in public office are nor elevated to the House of Lords if they are known to have abused thier office or position
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition simply seeks the Government not to elevate those in public office, who have abused their position in anyway, to the House of Lords.  This presently applies to those that have been convicted of the more serious criminal offences but should also include those that have been convicted of less serious offences such as drink drive ranging to those that have abused their office by having extra marital relationships whilst in office.
